title: NIT Trichy Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 02 Faculty Posts
description: The National Institute of Technology Trichy (NIT Trichy) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill the vacancies for 02 Faculty Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech., M.E/ M.Tech in Civil Engineering can grab this chance and apply for the NIT Trichy Recruitment 2025 . Here, we mentioned the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply bef...
